forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 64. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the atmosphere leans toward the cool and cloudy, with a gentle breeze threading through the streets. Despite moments of sun peeking through, most of the day will carry an inviting softness, as the high hovers around 64 degrees. A brisk west-southwest wind whispers through the city, lending an exhilarating freshness, bolstered by occasional gusts that dance through the air. As the daylight wanes, expect a gentle slide into a cooler evening, with temperatures slipping to around 57 degrees, promising a night that feels cozy yet lively. 

While there is a 20% chance of some moisture affecting the landscape, the fog that often enshrouds the bay is surprisingly lenient today, allowing for glimpses of the Golden Gate and the embracing hills beyond. Nonetheless, those venturing out would do well to embrace layers; a light jacket or sweater will offer comfort against the cool air. A stroll through one of the city's bustling neighborhoods or a quiet afternoon spent people-watching in a local café could satisfy the soul on such a beautifully mild day. Alternatively, the nearby expanses of nature provide an ideal backdrop for a reflective walk, presenting a perfect counterbalance to urban life as you take in the sights and sounds surrounding you.
